  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypeDataBinderAdapter
    public abstract class DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E extends java.lang.Enum<E>,​VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<?>>
extends DynamicBinderAdapter<VB>
    A DynamicBinderAdapter to display different type of DynamicTypeBinderAdapter inside a recycler view.
